extendedInfo.description: Note:  As updated station and bike information becomes available, it will automatically be reflected in the app.The official Citi Bike App is the perfect co-pilot for all your biking adventures in the city. From station locations to bike availability to route planning, and now with tips from The Scoop by The New York Times, youâll even know where to find a great lattÃ© or steak. Youâll have all the info you need to unlock the possibilities of New York. With 600 planned locations in New York, there'll be more Citi Bike stations than tattoo parlors. To find one, just explore the map, which shows every station in the city with a simple pin that also gives bike and dock availability. Or use the search bar and check out all the stations near your chosen location. Soon you'll know your way around town better than a New York cabbie. Just tap a station pin or location and the app will sniff out the quickest way to your destination before you can say, "Hey, I'm early again." Whether you're searching for Citi Bike stations, restaurants, stores, museums or anything else, there's nothing you won't have an answer for. The search results will always list stations at the top of the list and include bike/space availability at a glance.

reviews.title: Upgrade gets worse: GPS
reviews.comment: Nobody needs to see Citibank branches, coffee shops, or restaurants.  The GPS doesn\'t work very well in the latest ver.
reviews.author: Seung Mun

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Instead of adding useless features one can get elsewhere (restaurant reviews? Seriously?) Work on update latency.
reviews.author: Gregor J. Rothfuss

reviews.title: Always force closes on startup
reviews.comment: Useless since it will never fully start. But yes, restaurant reviews is what I need.
reviews.author: Dale Campbell

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: It crashes all the time, almost have me return bike late.
reviews.author: George Hung

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Pathetic app. Use Street\'Bike app instead. It shows no. of available bikes on stations so that one doesn\'t mess up. Official app is crap. It crashes. They really need to work on it.
reviews.author: Pratik Kumar

reviews.title: Force closes on s3
reviews.comment: This app force closes on my s3 everytime I open it.   Garbage dev
reviews.author: Sean Russell

reviews.title: Crashes constantly
reviews.comment: Since the last update I can\'t use the app anymore.
reviews.author: Najd Salas

reviews.title: Crashes on HTC one google edition
reviews.comment: Was working before but crashing frequently now.
reviews.author: Sonny To

reviews.title: Does. Not. Work.
reviews.comment: I\'m just wondering how they keep track of who to charge for time overages because.they clearly can\'t tell you if there is a bike/dock that\'s available. Hire some cheap interns if you can\'t get it. Our monkeys bc it would still be a drastic improvement to the app
reviews.author: Brian Lee

reviews.title: Restaurant review
reviews.comment: Omg, I can\'t believe I can see restaurants now straight from by citi bike app!!! Such a dumb idea. Duhh. Better biking map would be much more appropriate.
reviews.author: Volodymyr Gayovyy

reviews.title: Could be more useful
reviews.comment: I kinda like the app, it looks good and I like that it shows the availability of each station. But it would be nicer if it integrated directly with my CitiBike account, so that I don\'t have to start the timer manually (timer would start as soon as I unlock my bike).
reviews.author: Hern\303\241n Seoane

reviews.comment: Crashes within 3 secs on every launch. Nexus 4 Android 4.3.
reviews.author: Simon Cousins

reviews.title: New version crashes
reviews.comment: 1.0 was fast and functioning.  The 1.1 crashes all the time.  Hopefully the dev team will see the bad reviews and fix.  Or maybe simply allow reinstall of previous version.   Too bad as the app is quote useful and used to work. Update - got it to not crash with gps disable.  App not as useful but at least can use it now...
reviews.author: Laurent Comes

reviews.title: Latest update review
reviews.comment: After the most recent update, this app crashes shortly after launching and getting your location. Entering information in the search field also prompts it to crash.
reviews.author: Sacha Iskra

reviews.title: A good start, a few bugs
reviews.comment: This is the must-have app that makes bike sharing work.  Simple and fast but sometimes a little behind on data.     A couple of future features that would be nice: 1. Bike map on by default. 2. Access to your account: Profile, Billing, Trips would be awesome there 3. A way to use the phone as a bike key: Maybe leveraging off the pass code system in place for day/week rentals, create such code via the phone app so you don\'t even have to carry the key with you.
reviews.author: Tristan Louis

reviews.title: Good App, Could be Great App
reviews.comment: Latest Version: 8/5/2013 will not run. Keeps crashing on Droid M.   >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> This app is very functional and overall pretty darn good. However, it would be better with one data improvement and one functionality improvement.  (a) On the data -- it\'s often out of sync with nearly every station that I walk by. For me, typically, there are more bikes available and fewer docks that reported in the app.  (b) Functionality -- it seems like a no brainer to have a bike lane routing function in the app.
reviews.author: Kevin King

reviews.title: Pretty and useless
reviews.comment: Beautiful looking app. Information ALWAYS wrong. Available bikes listed lead to empty docking stations. Multiple available docks listed often lead to full stations.  Docking stations also unable to direct to nearest open spot. Wrong information is worse than no information.  Useless app.
reviews.author: Max Midroit

reviews.title: Much improvement needed
reviews.comment: I don\'t need to be informed every time that my gps is turned off as it is on purpose! Also when leaving app don\'t ask me whether i really want to quit - i am not a baby just let me exit. Finally i would like to have something that tells me how far i have been riding the bike today, this week, this month and this year. Should be possible i think?
reviews.author: Klaus Beck

reviews.comment: App now crashes every time after 3-4 seconds
reviews.author: Brian Siebenburgen

reviews.title: Was prefect...
reviews.comment: The app was simple and perfect before.  Now there\'s too much bloat and the app sometimes freezers/lags.  The biggest complaint is when you open the map, it\'s zoomed in to your exact location rather than a view of a few blocks radius.
reviews.author: Danny Gorman
